review: Changed the way we have our entire home setup.  These allow for wire free media entertainment to all out TV's in the house from music, to videos, to games and movies.  Easy to use and new applications and support coming out all the time.  Plus, when not in use, the pictures, weather and time are a nice addition.
author: Jeff

review: I'm not impressed.  The main reason I bought this was for the "screen mirroring" function.  This function is a beta feature and only works with a few phones and tablets, NOT any Bluetooth device.  Also, as reported by many, I have frequent problems with it freezing and loosing connectivity.  I think it may be related to heat buildup, because I have noticed that with a 2 hour movie, it is somewhat better until it gets to be about an hour or 1.5 hours into it, and then it freezes much more frequently.
